alert.note: Alert for Kinney; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 22 at 6:45PM CDT until August 22 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN KINNEY AND SOUTHEASTERN VAL VERDE COUNTIES... At 645 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a car stranded in flood waters at the intersection of Kings Way and Mary Lou Drive. Doppler radar estimates between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Del Rio, Lake View, Laughlin AFB, Val Verde Park, Amanda, Standart, Cienegas Terrace, Black Brush Point, Diablo East, Amistad Village, Escondido Estates, Lake Ridge Ranch and San Pedro Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
